COMPONENT         TYPE APIVERSION                        KIND                     NAME
=========         ==== ==========                        ====                     ====
certificate-crd   yaml apiextensions.k8s.io/v1beta1      CustomResourceDefinition certificates_certmanager_k8s_io
clusterissuer-crd yaml apiextensions.k8s.io/v1beta1      CustomResourceDefinition clusterissuers_certmanager_k8s_io
deployment        yaml apps/v1beta1                      Deployment               cert-manager
issuer-crd        yaml apiextensions.k8s.io/v1beta1      CustomResourceDefinition issuers_certmanager_k8s_io
rbac              yaml rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1 ClusterRole              cert-manager
rbac              yaml rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1 ClusterRoleBinding       cert-manager
serviceaccount    yaml v1                                ServiceAccount           cert-manager
